```typescriptreact
                  <span className="absolute -top-0.5 -right-1 text-xs leading-none">‚öôÔ∏è</span>
                </span>
                –∞
              </span>
            </div>
          </div>
          
          <h1 className="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-2">
            {step === 'phone' && '–î–æ–±—Ä–æ –ø–æ–∂–∞–ª–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å'}
            {step === 'register' && '–†–µ–≥–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è'}
            {step === 'login' && '–î–æ–±—Ä–æ –ø–æ–∂–∞–ª–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å'}
          </h1>
        </div>

        {error && (
          <div className="mb-6 p-4 bg-red-50 border-2 border-red-200 rounded-xl text-red-700">
            <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
              <span className="text-xl">‚ö†Ô∏è</span>
              <span className="font-semibold">{error}</span>

        )}

        {/* Step 1: Phone Input */}
        {step === 'phone' && (

            </p>

            <select
              value={employmentType}
              onChange={(e) => setEmploymentType(e.target.value)}
              className="w-full px-4 py-3 border-2 border-gray-200 rounded-xl focus:border-blue-500 focus:outline-none text-lg mb-4 bg-white"
            >
              <option value="individual">–§–∏–∑. –ª–∏—Ü–æ</option>
              <option value="self_employed">–°–∞–º–æ–∑–∞–Ω—è—Ç—ã–π</option>
              <option value="ip">–ò–ü</option>
              <option value="ooo">–û–û–û</option>
            </select>
            <input
              type="password"
              placeholder="–ü–∞—Ä–æ–ª—å (–Ω–µ –º–µ–Ω–µ–µ 6 —Å–∏–º–≤–æ–ª–æ–≤)"
              value={password}
              onChange={(e) => setPassword(e.target.value)}
              className="w-full px-4 py-3 border-2 border-gray-200 rounded-xl focus:border-blue-500 focus:outline-none text-lg mb-4"
            />
            <button
              onClick={handleRegister}
              disabled={loading}
              className={`w-full px-6 py-3 font-bold rounded-xl transition-colors ${
                !loading
                  ? 'bg-green-500 text-white hover:bg-green-600'
                  : 'bg-gray-300 text-gray-500 cursor-not-allowed'
              }`}
            >
              {loading ? '–†–µ–≥–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è...' : '–ó–∞—Ä–µ–≥–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å—Å—è'}
            </button>
          </div>
        )}

        {/* Step 3: Login Form */}
        {step === 'login' && (
          <div>
            <button
              onClick={() => setStep('phone')}
              className="mb-4 text-gray-600 hover:text-gray-900 flex items-center gap-2"
            >
              <span>‚Üê</span>
              <span>–ù–∞–∑–∞–¥</span>
            </button>
            <h2 className="text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-6">–í—Ö–æ–¥</h2>
            <p className="text-gray-600 mb-4">
              –í–æ–π–¥–∏—Ç–µ, –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É—è –≤–∞—à ID: {phone}
            </p>
            <input
              type="password"
              placeholder="–ü–∞—Ä–æ–ª—å"
              value={password}
              onChange={(e) => setPassword(e.target.value)}
              className="w-full px-4 py-3 border-2 border-gray-200 rounded-xl focus:border-blue-500 focus:outline-none text-lg mb-4"
            />
            <button
              onClick={handleLogin}
              disabled={loading}
              className={`w-full px-6 py-3 font-bold rounded-xl transition-colors ${
                !loading
                  ? 'bg-blue-500 text-white hover:bg-blue-600'
                  : 'bg-gray-300 text-gray-500 cursor-not-allowed'
              }`}
            >
              {loading ? '–í—Ö–æ–¥...' : '–í–æ–π—Ç–∏'}
            </button>
          </div>
        )}
      </div>
    </div>
  )
}
```

```css
@tailwind base;
@tailwind components;
@tailwind utilities;

:root {
  --foreground-rgb: 0, 0, 0;
  --background-start-rgb: 214, 219, 220;
  --background-end-rgb: 255, 255, 255;
}

@media (prefers-color-scheme: dark) {
  :root {
    --foreground-rgb: 255, 255, 255;
    --background-start-rgb: 0, 0, 0;
    --background-end-rgb: 0, 0, 0;
  }
}

body {
  color: rgb(var(--foreground-rgb));
  background: linear-gradient(
      to bottom,
      transparent,
      rgb(var(--background-end-rgb))
    )
    rgb(var(--background-start-rgb));
}

/* –ê–Ω–∏–º–∞—Ü–∏—è –¥–ª—è –±–ª–æ–±–æ–≤ –Ω–∞ —Ñ–æ–Ω–µ */
@keyframes blob {
  0% {
    transform: translate(0px, 0px) scale(1);
  }
  33% {
    transform: translate(30px, -50px) scale(1.1);
  }
  66% {
    transform: translate(-20px, 20px) scale(0.9);
  }
  100% {
    transform: translate(0px, 0px) scale(1);
  }
}

.animate-blob {
  animation: blob 7s infinite;
}

.animation-delay-2000 {
  animation-delay: 2s;
}

.animation-delay-4000 {
  animation-delay: 4s;
}
```

```typescriptreact
  const [lastName, setLastName] = useState('')
  const [employmentType, setEmploymentType] = useState('individual')
  const [agreePrivacy, setAgreePrivacy] = useState(true)
  const [agreeSecurity, setAgreeSecurity] = useState(true)

  const handleCheckPhone = async () => {
    if (!phone) return setError('–í–≤–µ–¥–∏—Ç–µ –Ω–æ–º–µ—Ä')
    if (!agreePrivacy || !agreeSecurity) {
      return setError('–ü–æ–∂–∞–ª—É–π—Å—Ç–∞, —Å–æ–≥–ª–∞—Å–∏—Ç–µ—Å—å —Å –ø–æ–ª–∏—Ç–∏–∫–∞–º–∏')
    }
    setLoading(true)
    setError(null)
    try {
      const res = await fetch('/api/auth/check-phone', {
        method: 'POST',
        headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
        body: JSON.stringify({ phone }),
        credentials: 'include'
      })
      
      if (res.status === 404) {
          await sendCode()
          setStep('register')
          return
      }

      const data = await res.json()
      if (data.exists) {
        setStep('login')
      } else {
        await sendCode()
        setStep('register')
      }
    } catch (e) {
      console.error(e)
      setStep('register') 
    } finally {
      setLoading(false)
    }
  }

  const sendCode = async () => {

  }
```

```typescriptreact
    if (!phone) return setError('–í–≤–µ–¥–∏—Ç–µ –Ω–æ–º–µ—Ä')

      return setError('–ü–æ–∂–∞–ª—É–π—Å—Ç–∞, —Å–æ–≥–ª–∞—Å–∏—Ç–µ—Å—å —Å –ø–æ–ª–∏—Ç–∏–∫–∞–º–∏')
    }
    setLoading(true)
    setError(null)
    try {
      const res = await fetch('/api/auth/check-phone', {
        method: 'POST',
        headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
        body: JSON.stringify({ phone }),
        credentials: 'include'
      })
      
      if (res.status === 404) {
          await sendCode()
          setStep('register')
          return
      }

      const data = await res.json()
      if (data.exists) {
        setStep('login')
      } else {
        await sendCode()
        setStep('register')
      }
    } catch (e) {
      console.error(e)
      setStep('register') 
    } finally {
      setLoading(false)
    }
  }

               headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
```

```css
@tailwind base;
@tailwind components;
@tailwind utilities;

html {
  scroll-behavior: smooth;
}

@layer base {
  body {
    font-family: 'PF BeauSans Pro', 'Montserrat', sans-serif;
  }
}

  .platform-page {

  }
  
  .touch-manipulation {
    touch-action: manipulation;
  }
}

@keyframes gradient {
  0% {
    background-position: 0% 50%;
  }
  50% {
    background-position: 100% 50%;
  }
  100% {
    background-position: 0% 50%;
  }
}

@keyframes fade-in {
  from {
    opacity: 0;
  }
  to {
    opacity: 1;
  }
}

.animate-fade-in {
  animation: fade-in 1s ease-out;
}

@keyframes fade-in-up {
  from {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateY(20px);
  }
  to {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateY(0);
  }
}

.animate-fade-in-up {
  animation: fade-in-up 1s ease-out;
}

.animation-delay-200 {
  animation-delay: 0.2s;
}

/* Swiper custom styles */
.swiper-button-next,
.swiper-button-prev {
  color: #00C742 !important;
  background: white !important;
  width: 44px !important;
  height: 44px !important;
  border-radius: 50% !important;
  box-shadow: 0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) !important;
}

.swiper-button-next:after,
.swiper-button-prev:after {
  font-size: 20px !important;
}

.swiper-pagination-bullet {
  background: #00C742 !important;
  opacity: 0.5 !important;
}

.swiper-pagination-bullet-active {
  opacity: 1 !important;
}

/* –ê–Ω–∏–º–∞—Ü–∏—è –¥–ª—è –±–ª–æ–±–æ–≤ –Ω–∞ —Ñ–æ–Ω–µ */
@keyframes blob {
  0% {
    transform: translate(0px, 0px) scale(1);
  }
  33% {
    transform: translate(30px, -50px) scale(1.1);
  }
  66% {
    transform: translate(-20px, 20px) scale(0.9);
  }
  100% {
    transform: translate(0px, 0px) scale(1);
  }
}

.animate-blob {
  animation: blob 7s infinite;
}

.animation-delay-2000 {
  animation-delay: 2s;
}

.animation-delay-4000 {
  animation-delay: 4s;
}
```

–ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä—è—é, —á—Ç–æ –≤—Å—ë —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞–µ—Ç. –û–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª—è—é —Å—Å—ã–ª–∫–∏ –≤ –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç–∞—Ö, —á—Ç–æ–±—ã –æ–Ω–∏ —É–∫–∞–∑—ã–≤–∞–ª–∏ –Ω–∞ –ø—Ä–∞–≤–∏–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –ø–æ—Ä—Ç—ã:



–°—Å—ã–ª–∫–∏ –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–µ–Ω—ã. –ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä—è—é, —á—Ç–æ –≤—Å—ë —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞–µ—Ç. –°–æ–∑–¥–∞—é –∫—Ä–∞—Ç–∫—É—é –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ü–∏—é –ø–æ –∑–∞–ø—É—Å–∫—É:



–ì–æ—Ç–æ–≤–æ. –°–¥–µ–ª–∞–Ω–æ:

1. **–°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω—ã –∫–æ–º–ø–æ–Ω–µ–Ω—Ç—ã –ø–ª–∞—Ç—Ñ–æ—Ä–º—ã** (—Ç–æ–ª—å–∫–æ –≤–∏–∑—É–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ —ç–ª–µ–º–µ–Ω—Ç—ã, –±–µ–∑ –ª–æ–≥–∏–∫–∏):

   - `Hero.tsx` ‚Äî –≥–ª–∞–≤–Ω—ã–π –±–∞–Ω–Ω–µ—Ä
   - `HeroMedia.tsx` ‚Äî –º–µ–¥–∏–∞-–±–ª–æ–∫
   - `Stats.tsx` ‚Äî —Å—Ç–∞—Ç–∏—Å—Ç–∏–∫–∞
   - `Features.tsx` ‚Äî –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –ø–ª–∞—Ç—Ñ–æ—Ä–º—ã
   - `WhyChoose.tsx` ‚Äî –ø–æ—á–µ–º—É –≤—ã–±–∏—Ä–∞—é—Ç –Ω–∞—Å
   - `Pricing.tsx` ‚Äî —Ç–∞—Ä–∏—Ñ—ã
   - `Roadmap.tsx` ‚Äî –¥–æ—Ä–æ–∂–Ω–∞—è –∫–∞—Ä—Ç–∞
   - `CTA.tsx` ‚Äî –ø—Ä–∏–∑—ã–≤ –∫ –¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏—é
   - `Footer.tsx` ‚Äî –ø–æ–¥–≤–∞–ª

2. **–û–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∞ –≥–ª–∞–≤–Ω–∞—è —Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω–∏—Ü–∞** (`app/page.tsx`) ‚Äî —Ç–µ–ø–µ—Ä—å —ç—Ç–æ –ø–ª–∞—Ç—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–µ–Ω–Ω–∞—è —Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω–∏—Ü–∞ –Ω–∞ –ø–æ—Ä—Ç—É 7000

5. **–û–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω—ã —Å—Ç–∏–ª–∏** –≤ `globals.css` ‚Äî –¥–æ–±–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω—ã –∞–Ω–∏–º–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –¥–ª—è –ø–ª–∞—Ç—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–π —Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω–∏—Ü—ã

```javascript
    }
```

```typescriptreact
        method: 'POST',
        headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
        body: JSON.stringify({ phone }),
        credentials: 'include'
      })
      
      if (res.status === 404) {

          setStep('register')

      const data = await res.json()
      if (data.exists) {
```

```typescriptreact
'use client'

export default function RegisterForm() {
  const router = useRouter()

  const [error, setError] = useState<string | null>(null)

  const [lastName, setLastName] = useState('')

  const [agreePrivacy, setAgreePrivacy] = useState(true)
  const [agreeSecurity, setAgreeSecurity] = useState(true)

  const handleCheckPhone = async () => {
    if (!phone) return setError('–í–≤–µ–¥–∏—Ç–µ –Ω–æ–º–µ—Ä')
    if (!agreePrivacy || !agreeSecurity) {
      return setError('–ü–æ–∂–∞–ª—É–π—Å—Ç–∞, —Å–æ–≥–ª–∞—Å–∏—Ç–µ—Å—å —Å –ø–æ–ª–∏—Ç–∏–∫–∞–º–∏')
    }
    setLoading(true)
    setError(null)
    try {
      const res = await fetch('/api/auth/check-phone', {
        method: 'POST',
        headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
        body: JSON.stringify({ phone }),
        credentials: 'include'
      })
      
      if (res.status === 404) {
          setStep('register')
          return
      }

      const data = await res.json()
      if (data.exists) {
        setStep('login')
      } else {
        setStep('register')
      }
    } catch (e) {
      console.error(e)
      setStep('register') 
    } finally {
      setLoading(false)
    }
  }

      try {
          await fetch('/api/auth/send-code', {
               method: 'POST',
               headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
               body: JSON.stringify({ phone }),
               credentials: 'include'
          })
      } catch (e) {
          console.error("Send code failed (check console backend)", e)
      }
  }
```

```typescriptreact
'use client'

export default function RegisterForm() {
  const router = useRouter()

  const [agreePrivacy, setAgreePrivacy] = useState(true)
  const [agreeSecurity, setAgreeSecurity] = useState(true)

  const handleCheckPhone = async () => {
    if (!phone) return setError('–í–≤–µ–¥–∏—Ç–µ –Ω–æ–º–µ—Ä')
    if (!agreePrivacy || !agreeSecurity) {
      return setError('–ü–æ–∂–∞–ª—É–π—Å—Ç–∞, —Å–æ–≥–ª–∞—Å–∏—Ç–µ—Å—å —Å –ø–æ–ª–∏—Ç–∏–∫–∞–º–∏')
    }
    setLoading(true)
    setError(null)
    try {
      const res = await fetch('/api/auth/check-phone', {
        method: 'POST',
        headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
        body: JSON.stringify({ phone }),
        credentials: 'include'
      })
      
      if (res.status === 404) {
          setStep('register')
          return
      }

      const data = await res.json()
      if (data.exists) {
        setStep('login')
      } else {
        setStep('register')
      }
    } catch (e) {
      console.error(e)
      setStep('register') 
    } finally {
      setLoading(false)
    }
  }
```

```typescriptreact
  const router = useRouter()

  const [agreeSecurity, setAgreeSecurity] = useState(true)

  const handleCheckPhone = async () => {
    if (!phone) return setError('–í–≤–µ–¥–∏—Ç–µ –Ω–æ–º–µ—Ä')
    if (!agreePrivacy || !agreeSecurity) {
      return setError('–ü–æ–∂–∞–ª—É–π—Å—Ç–∞, —Å–æ–≥–ª–∞—Å–∏—Ç–µ—Å—å —Å –ø–æ–ª–∏—Ç–∏–∫–∞–º–∏')
    }
    setLoading(true)
    setError(null)
    try {
      const res = await fetch('/api/auth/check-phone', {
        method: 'POST',
        headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
        body: JSON.stringify({ phone }),
        credentials: 'include'
      })
      
      if (res.status === 404) {
          setStep('register')
          return
      }

      const data = await res.json()
      if (data.exists) {
        setStep('login')
      } else {
        setStep('register')
      }
    } catch (e) {
      console.error(e)
      setStep('register') 
    } finally {
      setLoading(false)
    }
  }
```

```typescriptreact
  const [agreeSecurity, setAgreeSecurity] = useState(true)

  const handleCheckPhone = async () => {
    if (!phone) return setError('–í–≤–µ–¥–∏—Ç–µ –Ω–æ–º–µ—Ä')
    if (!agreePrivacy || !agreeSecurity) {
      return setError('–ü–æ–∂–∞–ª—É–π—Å—Ç–∞, —Å–æ–≥–ª–∞—Å–∏—Ç–µ—Å—å —Å –ø–æ–ª–∏—Ç–∏–∫–∞–º–∏')
    }
    setLoading(true)
    setError(null)
    try {
      const res = await fetch('/api/auth/check-phone', {
        method: 'POST',
        headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
        body: JSON.stringify({ phone }),
        credentials: 'include'
      })
      
      if (res.status === 404) {
          setStep('register')
          return
      }

      const data = await res.json()
      if (data.exists) {
        setStep('login')
      } else {
        setStep('register')
      }

      console.error(e)
```

```typescriptreact
type Step = 'phone' | 'login' | 'register'

export default function RegisterForm() {
  const router = useRouter()
  const [step, setStep] = useState<Step>('phone')
  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false)
  const [error, setError] = useState<string | null>(null)
  
  const [phone, setPhone] = useState('89200206767')
  const [password, setPassword] = useState('')
  const [firstName, setFirstName] = useState('')
  const [lastName, setLastName] = useState('')
  const [employmentType, setEmploymentType] = useState('individual')
  const [agreePrivacy, setAgreePrivacy] = useState(true)
  const [agreeSecurity, setAgreeSecurity] = useState(true)

  const handleCheckPhone = async () => {
    if (!phone) return setError('–í–≤–µ–¥–∏—Ç–µ –Ω–æ–º–µ—Ä')
    if (!agreePrivacy || !agreeSecurity) {
      return setError('–ü–æ–∂–∞–ª—É–π—Å—Ç–∞, —Å–æ–≥–ª–∞—Å–∏—Ç–µ—Å—å —Å –ø–æ–ª–∏—Ç–∏–∫–∞–º–∏')
    }
    setLoading(true)
    setError(null)
    try {
      const res = await fetch('/api/auth/check-phone', {
        method: 'POST',
        headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
        body: JSON.stringify({ phone }),
        credentials: 'include'
      })
      
      if (res.status === 404) {
          setStep('register')
          return
      }

      const data = await res.json()
      if (data.exists) {
        setStep('login')
      } else {
        setStep('register')
      }
    } catch (e) {
      console.error(e)
      setStep('register') 
    } finally {
      setLoading(false)
    }
  }


  const handleLogin = async () => {
    setLoading(true)
    try {
        const res = await fetch('/api/auth/login-password', {
            method: 'POST',
            headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
            body: JSON.stringify({ phone, password }),
            credentials: 'include'
        })
        if (!res.ok) throw new Error('–ù–µ–≤–µ—Ä–Ω—ã–π –ø–∞—Ä–æ–ª—å')
        
        const data = await res.json()
        localStorage.setItem('token', data.access_token)
        window.location.href = '/dashboard'
    } catch (e: any) {
        setError(e.message)
    } finally {
        setLoading(false)
    }
  }
```

```typescriptreact
    if (!agreePrivacy || !agreeSecurity) {
      return setError('–ü–æ–∂–∞–ª—É–π—Å—Ç–∞, —Å–æ–≥–ª–∞—Å–∏—Ç–µ—Å—å —Å –ø–æ–ª–∏—Ç–∏–∫–∞–º–∏')
    }
```

```typescriptreact
    if (!phone) return setError('–í–≤–µ–¥–∏—Ç–µ –Ω–æ–º–µ—Ä')
    if (!agreePrivacy || !agreeSecurity) {
      return setError('–ü–æ–∂–∞–ª—É–π—Å—Ç–∞, —Å–æ–≥–ª–∞—Å–∏—Ç–µ—Å—å —Å –ø–æ–ª–∏—Ç–∏–∫–∞–º–∏')
    }

        method: 'POST',
```

```typescriptreact
    if (!phone) return setError('–í–≤–µ–¥–∏—Ç–µ –Ω–æ–º–µ—Ä')
    if (!agreePrivacy || !agreeSecurity) {
      return setError('–ü–æ–∂–∞–ª—É–π—Å—Ç–∞, —Å–æ–≥–ª–∞—Å–∏—Ç–µ—Å—å —Å –ø–æ–ª–∏—Ç–∏–∫–∞–º–∏')
    }
    setLoading(true)

      const res = await fetch('/api/auth/check-phone', {
        method: 'POST',

        credentials: 'include'
      })

      const data = await res.json()
```

```typescriptreact
  const [agreeSecurity, setAgreeSecurity] = useState(true)

  const handleCheckPhone = async () => {
    if (!phone) return setError('–í–≤–µ–¥–∏—Ç–µ –Ω–æ–º–µ—Ä')
    if (!agreePrivacy || !agreeSecurity) {
      return setError('–ü–æ–∂–∞–ª—É–π—Å—Ç–∞, —Å–æ–≥–ª–∞—Å–∏—Ç–µ—Å—å —Å –ø–æ–ª–∏—Ç–∏–∫–∞–º–∏')
    }

      const res = await fetch('/api/auth/check-phone', {
        method: 'POST',

      })
```

```typescriptreact
  const [agreeSecurity, setAgreeSecurity] = useState(true)

  const handleCheckPhone = async () => {
    if (!phone) return setError('–í–≤–µ–¥–∏—Ç–µ –Ω–æ–º–µ—Ä')
    if (!agreePrivacy || !agreeSecurity) {
      return setError('–ü–æ–∂–∞–ª—É–π—Å—Ç–∞, —Å–æ–≥–ª–∞—Å–∏—Ç–µ—Å—å —Å –ø–æ–ª–∏—Ç–∏–∫–∞–º–∏')
    }
    setLoading(true)
    setError(null)
    try {
      const res = await fetch('/api/auth/check-phone', {
        method: 'POST',
        headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
        body: JSON.stringify({ phone }),
        credentials: 'include'
      })
      
      if (res.status === 404) {

      const data = await res.json()
      if (data.exists) {
        setStep('login')

        method: 'POST',
        headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },

        credentials: 'include'
      })
```
      
```typescriptreact
      if (res.status === 404) {

      const data = await res.json()

          {(step === 'phone') && (
```

```typescriptreact
'use client'

import { useState } from 'react'
import { useRouter } from 'next/navigation'
import Image from 'next/image'

type Step = 'phone' | 'login' | 'register'

export default function RegisterForm() {
  const router = useRouter()
  const [step, setStep] = useState<Step>('phone')
  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false)
  const [error, setError] = useState<string | null>(null)
  
  const [phone, setPhone] = useState('89200206767')
  const [password, setPassword] = useState('')
  const [confirmPassword, setConfirmPassword] = useState('')
  const [firstName, setFirstName] = useState('')
  const [lastName, setLastName] = useState('')
  const [employmentType, setEmploymentType] = useState('individual')
  const [agreePrivacy, setAgreePrivacy] = useState(true)
  const [agreeSecurity, setAgreeSecurity] = useState(true)

  const handleCheckPhone = async () => {
    if (!phone) return setError('–í–≤–µ–¥–∏—Ç–µ –Ω–æ–º–µ—Ä')
    if (!agreePrivacy || !agreeSecurity) {
      return setError('–ü–æ–∂–∞–ª—É–π—Å—Ç–∞, —Å–æ–≥–ª–∞—Å–∏—Ç–µ—Å—å —Å –ø–æ–ª–∏—Ç–∏–∫–∞–º–∏')
    }
    setLoading(true)
    setError(null)
    try {
      const res = await fetch('/api/auth/check-phone', {
        method: 'POST',
        headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
        body: JSON.stringify({ phone }),
        credentials: 'include'
      })
      
      if (res.status === 404) {
          setStep('register')
          return
      }

      const data = await res.json()
      if (data.exists) {
        setStep('login')
      } else {
        setStep('register')
      }
    } catch (e) {
      console.error(e)
      setStep('register') 
    } finally {
      setLoading(false)
    }
  }


  const handleLogin = async () => {
    setLoading(true)

        const res = await fetch('/api/auth/login-password', {
            method: 'POST',

            body: JSON.stringify({ phone, password }),
            credentials: 'include'
        })

        const data = await res.json()
        localStorage.setItem('token', data.access_token)
        window.location.href = '/dashboard'
    } catch (e: any) {
        setError(e.message)
    } finally {
        setLoading(false)
    }

  const handleRegister = async () => {

          {(step === 'phone') && (
```

```typescriptreact
'use client'

type Step = 'phone' | 'login' | 'register'

export default function RegisterForm() {
  const router = useRouter()

  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false)
  const [error, setError] = useState<string | null>(null)

  const [lastName, setLastName] = useState('')

  const [agreePrivacy, setAgreePrivacy] = useState(true)
  const [agreeSecurity, setAgreeSecurity] = useState(true)

  const handleCheckPhone = async () => {
    if (!phone) return setError('–í–≤–µ–¥–∏—Ç–µ –Ω–æ–º–µ—Ä')
    if (!agreePrivacy || !agreeSecurity) {
      return setError('–ü–æ–∂–∞–ª—É–π—Å—Ç–∞, —Å–æ–≥–ª–∞—Å–∏—Ç–µ—Å—å —Å –ø–æ–ª–∏—Ç–∏–∫–∞–º–∏')
    }
    setLoading(true)
    setError(null)
    try {
      const res = await fetch('/api/auth/check-phone', {
        method: 'POST',
        headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
        body: JSON.stringify({ phone }),
        credentials: 'include'
      })
      
      if (res.status === 404) {
          setStep('register')
          return
      }

      const data = await res.json()
      if (data.exists) {
        setStep('login')
      } else {
        setStep('register')
      }
    } catch (e) {
      console.error(e)
      setStep('register') 
    } finally {
      setLoading(false)
    }
  }

        const res = await fetch('/api/auth/login-password', {
            method: 'POST',

            body: JSON.stringify({ phone, password }),
            credentials: 'include'
        })

    } catch (e: any) {
        setError(e.message)
    } finally {
        setLoading(false)
    }

  const handleRegister = async () => {

        <div className="absolute -bottom-40 -left-40 w-80 h-80 rounded-full mix-blend-multiply filter blur-xl opacity-70 animate-blob animation-delay-2000" style={{ backgroundColor: '#0082D6' }}></div>
        <div className="absolute top-1/2 left-1/2 transform -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 w-80 h-80 rounded-full mix-blend-multiply filter blur-xl opacity-70 animate-blob animation-delay-4000" style={{ backgroundColor: '#00B36C' }}></div>

          {(step === 'phone') && (
```
